name: IslandInvasion
description:
The blue infantrymen want to conquer your island. Shoot back. You attack with a SMAW or a AK-47. You can play three modes: invasion, missiles and air battle. Stop the invasion! But watch out for the blue fighter-bomber!

Controls:

WASD - Walk
Space - Jump
LeftMouseButton - Shoot
RightMouseButton - Zoom
1 - SMAW
2 - AK47
R - Reload
